column1: Filename: Tribal Crime in United States, 2009
Table title: Offenses Known to Tribal Law Enforcement 2009
Data source(s): Federal Bureau of Investigation, Crime in the United States, 2009 (Extract File)

column2: Little River Band of Ottawa Tribal

column1: Total number of reporting tribal law enforcement agencies
1/Arson is not included in the property crime total in this table; however, if complete arson data were provided, it will appear in the arson column.
2/The FBI does not publish arson data unless it receives data from either the agency or the state for all 12 months of the calendar year.
Source:  FBI, Crime in the United States, Table 11. Offenses Known to Law Enforcement, 2009.
